alert.note: Alert for King William; King and Queen; Middlesex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 8:40PM EDT until April 01 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL MIDDLESEX...SOUTHEASTERN KING AND QUEEN AND SOUTHEASTERN KING WILLIAM COUNTIES... At 840 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near King And Queen Court House, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... West Point and Little Plymouth around 845 PM EDT. Shacklefords around 850 PM EDT. Church View around 855 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lanesville, Mascot, Cooke, Velma, Romancoke, Cohoke, Clancie and Rose Garden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: King William; King and Queen; Middlesex
